name: The cake is a liar
description:
Everyone lived quietly in the candy village, until one day an accident happened and the village was completely destroyed. Many people blamed the destruction on the very clumsy young cake, but deep down cake knew that the people who had done it had been the fast food town people, but nobody believed in cake, and everyone started shouting: "cake is liar","kill him". It was then that cake set off on the path of mountain pain after answers from the cake god, to prove his innocence and get help restoring the candy village.

HOW TO PLAY:  - 'A' AND 'D' TO MOVE AROUND
                                     - LMB TO SHOOT
                                     - 'R' TO RESTART     
                                     - 'SPACE' TO JUMP
                                     - 'SHIFT' SPEED BOOST
